title: Adepitcon 2024 Recap
description:
Billed as the “premier wargaming convention”, this past weekend was the annual Adepitcon. Held in Schaumburg IL, Adepticon is going on 22 years strong. While not a huge convention compared to Gen Con, PAX U, or Origins, It still attracts a sizable crowd. One interesting thing about Adoption is how it’s hyper focused on a […]

title: Crowdfunding Quest – 3/25/24
description:
Crowdfunding Quest is back this week with another large batch of campaigns for you to check out. We’ve got a nice grouping from war games to euro games to party games. So hopefully you find something here that piques your interest. And if you missed it on Friday, be sure to check out Bailey’s list […]
